channel.title: one on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in one on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-30
item.description: Amazon partners with Affirm to roll out first buy now, pay later option on the e-commerce site (2 minute read) Amazon has partnered with Affirm to offer installment payment options.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-18
item.description: Amazon built an Alexa cuckoo clock and wants your help backing new projects like this one (2 minute read) Amazon’s ‘Built It’ program is a Kickstarter-like effort where customers can choose to back a product, and if there is enough support within 30 days, Amazon will build it.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-30
item.description: Tesla owners are going to be able to remotely view what their Autopilot cameras can see (3 minute read) Tesla owners will be able to see through their Autopilot cameras in the new update that is likely to be pushed out around the holidays.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-13
item.description: The Pentagon Wants Elon Musk to Yeet Cargo Around the Planet In an Hour (2 minute read) The Pentagon has contracted SpaceX to develop rockets to deliver packages around the planet in under an hour.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-04
item.description: Google announces Pixel 5, Pixel 4A 5G, and Pixel 4A all at once (7 minute read) Google has announced the Pixel 4A, Pixel 5, and the Pixel 4A 5G.
